title: 2 years later and still waiting for the OCE skin
body: Rito still waiting for people to forget the promise of a free oceania skin. What trolls{{champion:48}}

replies.body:
Hey Verbal, check out the "Riot OCE Update and Q&A" thread that's pinned to the top of the boards.

To save you time, here's a direct link to a comment from MasterMirkinen within that thread: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/iFdEkXnp-riot-oce-update-and-qa?comment=00060000
Didn't we all get Pool Party Ziggs? I thought that was the OCE skin

> [{quoted}](name=canyoudigitSUCKA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MnXFkm7X,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-25T06:19:45.852+0000)
>
> Didn't we all get Pool Party Ziggs? I thought that was the OCE skin

no
they already said they are making it, just need to work on it and publish it, its supposed to be "detailed" and it better damnwell be after all this time
